text: Not going to make it to standup today. Yesterday Gaston gave me the rundown on Gulp files and I started one that zips up all of our files so they can be easily transported to the device. Still hoping to get to the last part of my card due today and introduce some ApiDocs.
please head to the walnut table for standup!

<@U02E3CRMA>: Sommely Architecture Document: An overall system design document for the Prototype. This would cover electronics as well as the wine rack layout and details on how we’d make it robust enough to not require someone to attend it constantly.
Setting deliverable date (in contract) for next week so it gives us time.
I’ll make sure we have a reasonable draft by Friday so we have time to iterate
btw related to shashi's note, im pretty sure net 45 is their standard. joel does net 45 sound like what intel does?
shashi said net 30 and i got confused
though IIRC we typically hit net 30 since payment cycles are biweekly
i’ll confirm the terms w/ shashi.
added that deliverable as a contract item for next week, but the invoice can be sent once it’s delivered, so if we deliver sooner, we invoice sooner
